attributes.action: Permit the UK Indigenous Population to Rightfully Object to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rejection of the "Commissioner for Public Appointments", her appointees and preferences. Let's have Standards in public life that deserve better than this statement from our DCMS: "appointees to our boards should not only be the best people for the job"
Obviously the leader of DCMS is seeking recruitment of similar incomptetents.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
